mainModules.cli/: Command-line interface, including init, commands, simple-commands
mainModules.swarm/: Swarm orchestration with strategies, optimizations, workers
mainModules.mcp/: Model Context Protocol integration with tests, recovery, transports

sourceCodeOrganization.organizationPattern: Modular, feature-based with clear separation of concerns

significantStructuralElements.multiplatformBinaries: Node20 binaries for Linux, macOS, Windows
significantStructuralElements.comprehensiveDocs: 200+ documentation files including migration guides, API references
significantStructuralElements.richExamples: 258 example files covering various use cases
significantStructuralElements.largeTestSuite: 182 test files with unit, integration, e2e, performance tests
significantStructuralElements.hiddenConfigs: Multiple hidden directories for tool-specific configurations

architecturalPatterns.buildArtifacts: dist/ for ESM, dist-cjs/ for CommonJS
architecturalPatterns.testOrganization: Separate directories for unit, integration, e2e, performance tests
architecturalPatterns.documentationStructure: Numbered guides, API references, planning docs, reports
architecturalPatterns.exampleStructure: Numbered categories: configurations, workflows, demos, testing, apps, tutorials
architecturalPatterns.scriptingSupport: 49 scripts for build, test, fix, migration, deployment

keyObservations.enterpriseScale: Large codebase with 900+ code files indicating enterprise-grade platform
keyObservations.comprehensiveTooling: 87 MCP tools as advertised, extensive CLI capabilities
keyObservations.performanceOriented: Significant investment in benchmarking and optimization
keyObservations.wellDocumented: Extensive documentation covering all aspects of the platform
keyObservations.multiEnvironment: Support for Docker, NPM, binary distributions
keyObservations.testCoverage: Comprehensive test suite with multiple testing strategies
keyObservations.modularArchitecture: Clear separation between core, swarm, MCP, UI, and enterprise features

unusualElements.hiveMindConcept: Novel AI coordination approach with queen-worker pattern
unusualElements.neuralIntegration: 27+ cognitive models with WASM SIMD acceleration
